meanings.definition: Used to express disgust or revulsion.
meanings.sent1: Yecch! That spoiled milk smells terrible!
meanings.sent2: Yecch, I accidentally stepped on a slug!
meanings.sent3: Yecch, the cafeteria food looks like it's been sitting out for days.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing garbage can was a yecch-filled sight.
meanings.sent5: The slimy texture of the raw egg made me yecch in disgust.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of distaste or displeasure.
meanings.sent2: Yecch, I hate the smell of cigarette smoke.
meanings.sent3: Yecch, the thought of eating bugs makes me shudder.
meanings.sent4: The muddy puddle was a yecch obstacle to avoid.
meanings.sent5: The sticky, gooey substance made a loud yecch sound as it oozed out.
